sections.image_description: The four children stand together in the castle courtyard as their bodies begin to shimmer and transform. Evan's arms spread wide as feathers appear, Isaac's body becomes round and fuzzy, Aaron grows scales and a long tail, and Aurelia develops black and white fur patches.
sections.text: הַיְּלָדִים נֶהֶפְכוּ לְחַיּוֹת. אֶבֶן לְיַנְשׁוּף, יִצְחָק לְקוֹאָלָה, אַהֲרֹן לְדִינוֹזוֹר, וְאוֹרֵלְיָה לְדֹב פַּנְדָּה.

sections.image_description: The transformed children creep quietly across the courtyard stones. Evan the owl flies silently overhead while Isaac the koala, Aaron the dinosaur, and Aurelia the panda move stealthily along the ground, staying in shadows.
sections.text: הֵם הָלְכוּ בְּלַחַשׁ חֲזָרָה אֶל הַטִּירָה. הַיַּנְשׁוּף עָף בַּשָּׁמַיִם וְהַחַיּוֹת הָלְכוּ עַל הָאֲדָמָה.

sections.image_description: The four animal children stand boldly before Bowser's massive throne. Aaron the small dinosaur roars bravely, Evan the owl spreads his wings wide, while Isaac the koala and Aurelia the panda stand firm beside them, all facing the imposing turtle king.
sections.text: הֵם בָּאוּ לִפְנֵי בָּאוּסֶר וְאָמְרוּ: שַׁלַּח אֶת כָּל הַיְּלָדִים! תֵּן לָהֶם חֹפֶשׁ!

sections.image_description: Bowser throws his massive head back and lets out a thunderous laugh that echoes through the throne room. His sharp teeth gleam as he points mockingly at the small transformed children, his eyes gleaming with cruel amusement.
sections.text: בָּאוּסֶר צָחַק צָחֹק גָּדוֹל וְאָמַר: לֹא! הַיְּלָדִים יַעַבְדוּ יוֹתֵר קָשֶׁה!

sections.image_description: Children throughout the work area are now carrying heavier stones and working faster than before. The koopa guards crack their whips more frequently, and the children's faces show exhaustion and despair as they struggle with the increased workload.
sections.text: הַיְּלָדִים עָבְדוּ יוֹתֵר קָשֶׁה. הֵם נָשְׂאוּ אֲבָנִים כְּבֵדוֹת וְהָיוּ עֲיֵפִים מְאֹד.

sections.image_description: Aaron the small dinosaur sits on the ground with his head down, tears streaming down his scaly cheeks. His tiny dinosaur body shakes with sobs as he watches the other children struggling with their heavy work.
sections.text: אַהֲרֹן הַדִּינוֹזוֹר הָיָה עָצֵב מְאֹד וּבָכָה. הוּא רָאָה אֶת הַיְּלָדִים עוֹבְדִים קָשֶׁה.

sections.image_description: A friendly golden retriever named Shenzi runs up to the crying dinosaur and wraps her furry arms around him in a warm embrace. Aaron's tears begin to slow as he feels the comfort of the dog's hug.
sections.text: שֶׁנְצִי הַכֶּלֶב בָּאָה וְחָבְקָה אֶת אַהֲרֹן. הִיא עָשְׂתָה אוֹתוֹ שָׂמֵחַ.

sections.image_description: A group of small yellow minions waddle into the work area carrying a glowing magical staff between them. They giggle and chatter excitedly as they present the staff to the four transformed children with wide grins.
sections.text: הַמִּינְיוֹנִים הֵבִיאוּ מַטֵּה קֶסֶם כְּמַתָּנָה לַיְּלָדִים. הַמַּטֶּה הָיָה יָפֶה וְנָתַן אוֹר.

sections.image_description: The four animal children gather around the magical staff, their eyes wide with wonder as it glows brightly in their midst. The staff pulses with magical energy, and the children reach out to touch it carefully.
sections.text: הַיְּלָדִים אָמְרוּ: זֶה מַטֵּה קֶסֶם! הוּא יַעֲזֹר לָנוּ לְהוֹשִׁיעַ אֶת כָּל הַיְּלָדִים!

sections.image_description: Evan the owl grasps the magical staff in his talons and holds it high above his head. The staff's light grows brighter, casting hopeful shadows across the work area as the other children look on with renewed determination.
sections.text: אֶבֶן לָקַח אֶת הַמַּטֶּה בְּיָדוֹ וְאָמַר: עַתָּה נוּכַל לְהִלָּחֵם בְּבָאוּסֶר!
